attributes.title: 2014 Chevrolet Utility 1.4

attributes.description:
For those looking for a small luxury car that can both dominate a winding mountain road and cruise the highway in complete comfort, there are few true competitors to the extremely capable 2016 BMW 2 Series.The entry-level 2 Series is a good place to start, as it blends performance and luxury into a compact package that's more affordable than you might think The 220i forms part of BMW's F23 series. The 4 cylinder, double overhead camshaft turbocharged engine has 4 valves per cylinder and a capacity of 2 litres. For this model it develops power and torque figure 135 kW 290 Nm. Its claimed weight at the kerb is 1455 kg. Maximum speed stated is 235 km/h, manufacturer claimed fuel consumption is 7.6/4.7/5.7 l/100km urban/extra-urban/combined

We are based in CAPE TOWN (22 Section Street, Unit 1B, North Gate Park, Paarden Eiland) - Opposite North Gate Estate 

We offer Finance through all major banks and trade ins are considered. 

Bloomsbury is known for supplying prestige and quality motor vehicles and motor cycles, we’d love to do the same for you TODAY!

E&OE
